byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Omar Al-Jawoshy, Ahmed Saleh and Falih Hassan from Baghdad, and an employee of The New York Times from Salahuddin Province.

abstract: Iraqi security forces and allied Shiite militias seize large areas of Tikrit, with reports indicating most of Islamic State militants are in retreat from city.
lead_paragraph: The progress came after more than a week of heavy fighting by Shiite militias and Iraqi government troops to oust ISIS forces from the strategic city.

headline.main: Iraqi and Shiite Forces Seize Large Parts of Tikrit From Islamic State
headline.print_headline: Iraqi and Shiite Forces Seize Large Parts of Tikrit From Islamic State

snippet: The progress came after more than a week of heavy fighting by Shiite militias and Iraqi government troops to oust ISIS forces from the strategic city.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
